text: Dale Allan Gardner (November 8, 1948 - February 19, 2014) was an American NASA astronaut. He flew two Space Shuttle missions during the early 1980s. He was born in Fairmont, Minnesota. Gardner died from a brain hemorrhage on February 19, 2014 in his Colorado home. He was aged 65. He was outlived by his two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Dale Gardner at Space Facts Category:1948 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American astronauts Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage Category:Scientists from Minnesota
title: Dale Gardner
